name: Racoon Party Jam
description:
Once upon a time in a faraway city there lived two racoons. But these weren’t your average racoons. You see, Bob and Jeff were a bit special. Fascinated by human nature they vowed to live life as humans do. Everything was going well for Bob and Jeff until a new neighbour moved in next to them. Help our little rascals contain their secret by putting together a cunning plan to get the neighbour to move out.

 _____________________________________________________________________________________________

Controls

A/D : Movement (Side to side)

<-/-> : Tilting

Space : Jump

F : Interact

  _____________________________________________________________________________________________

This game was created in 48 hours for the Indie Game Academy Jelly Jam 2023 following the theme Sun up to Sun down by a team of 4:

Matej Dvorak - Sound Design, Dubbing, Text writing

Miky Petrik (mi-ky) - Game Design, Programming

Ondra Dolejs - Game Design, 3D modelling

Tomas Horacek - Character Design, 3D modelling
